keyMoments.title: Tonjit's First Appearance - Stuck on Stilts
keyMoments.description: Tonjit is discovered by Luffy, Usopp, and Chopper while stuck on incredibly tall bamboo stilts for 10 years due to acrophobia. He explains how his obsession with setting a world record trapped him, and only his loyal horse Shelly stayed with him when his tribe migrated.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a key supporting character whose predicament and relationship with Shelly sets up the emotional stakes for the Davy Back Fight arc.
keyMoments.quote: I've been up here for 10 years! I was trying to break the world record for the tallest stilts, but when I got up here, I realized I'm terrified of heights!

keyMoments.title: Tonjit Rescued by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy helps Tonjit by breaking his bamboo stilts, freeing him after a decade of being trapped. Despite the painful landing, Tonjit is grateful for his freedom.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tonjit's relief and gratitude, establishing him as a sympathetic character who will become involved in the Foxy Pirates conflict.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you! Finally, after all these years!

relationships.description: Tonjit's beloved horse who waited loyally for him for 10 years while he was stuck on stilts.

evolutionMoments.description: Shelly is revealed to have stayed with Tonjit for 10 years while his tribe migrated, demonstrating extraordinary loyalty.

reveals.information: Has been stuck on stilts for 10 years due to acrophobia
Obsessed with setting world records, particularly for stilt walking

keyMoments.title: First Encounter with Shelly
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Usopp, and Chopper meet Shelly, a white horse with an extraordinarily long neck. Chopper mistakes her for a giraffe due to her unusual proportions. She is waiting loyally for Tonjit.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Shelly as a symbol of unwavering loyalty and patience.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Shoots Shelly
keyMoments.description: Foxy callously shoots Shelly with a flare gun to provoke the Straw Hats into accepting his Davy Back Fight challenge, severely injuring the loyal horse.
keyMoments.significance: This cruel act becomes the catalyst for Luffy accepting the Davy Back Fight, making Shelly central to the arc's conflict.

height: Extremely tall due to Long Ring Long Land's characteristics

relationships.description: Tonjit's loyal horse who waited 10 years for him without leaving.

evolutionMoments.description: Revealed to have stayed with Tonjit for 10 years while he was stuck on stilts, demonstrating extraordinary loyalty.

reveals.information: A horse from Long Ring Long Land with extremely elongated proportions
Extremely loyal, waited 10 years for Tonjit without leaving

keyMoments.title: Foxy Pirates Debut - Foxy Shoots Shelly
keyMoments.description: Foxy makes his first appearance along with Hamburg and Porche. He callously shoots Shelly with a flare gun to get the Straw Hats' attention and provoke them into accepting his challenge.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Foxy as the main antagonist of the Long Ring Long Land Arc and demonstrates his cruel, manipulative nature.
keyMoments.quote: Sorry about that. I needed to get your attention somehow.

keyMoments.title: Introduction of the Davy Back Fight
keyMoments.description: Foxy introduces the Davy Back Fight tradition to the Straw Hats, explaining that his crew has won 920 competitions and gained all their members through these games.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a major pirate tradition that becomes the central conflict of the arc.
keyMoments.quote: The Davy Back Fight! An ancient pirate tradition where crews compete for each other's members! We've won 920 times and gained all our crew through these games!

relationships.description: Hamburg is one of Foxy's top subordinates and the leader of the Groggy Monsters.

evolutionMoments.description: Hamburg introduced as one of Foxy's main crew members.

relationships.description: Porche is one of Foxy's top subordinates and the crew's idol.

evolutionMoments.description: Porche introduced as one of Foxy's main crew members.

reveals.information: User of the Noro Noro no Mi (Slow-Slow Fruit)
Has won 920 Davy Back Fights and built crew through these victories

keyMoments.title: Porche's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Porche appears alongside Foxy and Hamburg as one of the Foxy Pirates' main members. She is introduced as the crew's idol.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the main antagonists of the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

relationships.description: Serves as one of Foxy's top subordinates and the crew's idol.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as a main member of the Foxy Pirates.

reveals.information: Serves as the Foxy Pirates' idol, beloved by the crew

keyMoments.title: Hamburg's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Hamburg appears alongside Foxy and Porche as one of the Foxy Pirates' main members. He is a large, gorilla-like man who serves as the leader of the Groggy Monsters.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the main combatants of the Foxy Pirates.

relationships.description: Serves as one of Foxy's top subordinates and occasionally as his mount.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as a main member of the Foxy Pirates.

reveals.information: Leader of the Groggy Monsters, a combat unit within the Foxy Pirates
